titleStmt.title: Application of Robin Holmes for a Habeas Corpus directed to Nathaniel Ford

bibl.title: Application of Robin Holmes for a Habeas Corpus to Nathaniel Ford. Court Journal.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

msIdentifier.idno: U.S. 1st Judicial District Court Journal, Vol 1., October 1851-May 1859; Polk County; p 48-49. Oregon State Archives.

div1.p: Application of Robin Holmes for a Habeas Corpus directed to Natheniel Ford to bring up the bodies of Jenny or Mary Jane Holmes, Roxanna Holmes and James Holmes, children of said Robin Holmes-

And now at this day came the said Robin Holmes by D.B. Brinnan his counsel, and moved the court in the presence of the said Nathaniel Ford who appeared by Leyres Alney esq his counsel, for a writ of Habeas corpus to bring up the bodies of Jenny or Mary Jane, James and Roxanna Holmes claimed as his children, alleged to be restrained of their liberty by Nathaniel Ford; and the said Nathaniel Ford by his counsel afortsaid, counseling thereto and waiving a preliminary affidavit and petetion preparatory to issuing the same, it was ordered that said writ issue and made returnable to the next term of this Court.
